Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts expect a delayed start from earlier 2025 targets due to AI dexterity issues and supply chain bottlenecks. Initial focus on internal factory use; external deliveries begin in 2H 2026.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect a rapid 10x ramp from 2025 driven by Musk's exponential growth expectations.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Production begins April 2026 at Giga Texas using unboxed manufacturing. Analysts project 2M per year capacity but limit output to select cities due to FSD approvals.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect a rapid ramp from April to December rising from 1K to 150K per month, reaching 551K total.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts expect strong scaling toward a 1M per year line by 2030; demand concentrated in industrial and commercial sectors.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect a 10x jump from 2026 driven by the first 1M per year line going online.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts expect Cybercab to reach full 2M per year capacity in 2027 with expanded FSD approvals and new lines in Texas and Shanghai.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect Cybercab to become Tesla's top-volume model comprising more than 50% of output.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts project that a 100K per month line will enable 1M+ per year as industrial and commercial adoption expands.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect explosive growth driven by a second 10M per year line reaching 11M total capacity.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Regulatory approvals in the U.S. and overseas enable broader robotaxi rollout; pilot programs scale to thousands.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect Cybercab to capture more than 10% of global auto share with widespread FSD approvals.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts expect 1M per year by 2030 with robotics becoming a multi-billion-unit global market; long-term 100M per year potential.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect 5.5M to 100M units with aggressive assumptions of consumer adoption.

Pro_Analyst_Description: Analysts project steady 2–4M per year robotaxi production with expansion to 50+ cities by 2030.
Retail_Description: Retail investors expect more than 4M per year with robotaxi fleets across 50+ cities and high-margin ride revenue.
